name: DuplicateDiscount
description:
Duplicates the requested discount x times with it's conditions and action.
A duplicated discount will not be Active and Verified.

properties.name: DiscountID
properties.description: The ID of the discount to create a copy of.

properties.name: NumberOfDuplicates
properties.description: Indicate how many duplicates need to be made. When left empty, only 1 duplicate will be made.
